website_summaries.verdict: A consistent, capable machine that can handle all types of food. Not designed for bulk processing.
pros: Rubberized feet hold it to table

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice for home but it real lound and some times when I use it ,it feels like I'm on the movie saw.
customer_reviews.author: DjBuck

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for slicing bacon
customer_reviews.text: The unit runs well but the blade is not as sharp as the manual says it is. And it does not fun fast enough to slice bacon that is not firm. If the bacon is frozen, it works well. The blade removes easily to clean. The depth gauge moves so it is hard to tell how big of a slice will result. And I cannot remove the adjusting knob to see why the gauge moves. If you're buying this to slice bacon, get something better (more expensive?).
customer_reviews.author: D-Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good slicer
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen. I use it exclusively to slice fruits and veges for dehydration. It takes a little finesse to get the rhythm of cutting and not all fruits and vegetables cut the same. My pineapple, papaya sliced beautifully but eggplant not so much. Cleanup is not the easiest, it’s cumbersome and hard to always get every nook and cranny. Small enough that it doesn’t take up too much space. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Veggie100

customer_reviews.title: Shop around
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. Not a great quality but does the job. Don't use often otherwise I would send back. Not easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for the price but the motor could be a bit more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Vanderbilt

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: This slicer works good at cutting meat but the clean up is a pain in the rear! I'll go back to using a sharp knife. This would work good if you're preparing more than 5lbs of the same kind of meat.
customer_reviews.author: samuel j garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. The blade chewed up the food. The motor is so loud and grinding. Horrible to try and clean, and the suction is non existent. It’s not easy to maneuver the holder as it slips off. Don’t waste your money. Get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Ceccarelli

customer_reviews.title: Get all metal one, not plastic gear one.
customer_reviews.text: Never opened. Found too many bad reviews after I ordered. Upgraded and got an all metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I was a little unsure how the would be since this was a second choice but this was even better than we thought. We process our own meat so this makes it so much easier. Make sure your meat is slightly frozen bc it will cut better than warm meat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I anticipated more when I purchased this. I wanted something to cut raw meat slices very thin. Even though I froze the meat a little before slicing as recommended, it still has the tendency to gum up the works. There is a lot of plastic in this unit. For my purposes, it is just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy. It is definitely not meant for cutting bread, unless it is a pre-sliced soft Wonder Bread. It can't handle anything with a crust, because it doesn't have a clear path for the slice to exit. It is not meant for cutting roast beef, salami or anything harder, because the motor is underpowered, and because it is made out of flimsy plastic that can't keep even thickness. And it cannot be properly cleaned and sterilized, even though the blade is removable, because it has crevices and holes where food particles accumulate.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wash the machine by hand with a sponge with Dawn soap. Do not submerge it in water
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Works awesome. Cutting is easy. Nice thin slices. Cuts roast beef with ease I would definitely buy this slicer machine
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do even cuts even if you try to do very little pressure. Other than that if you don't care about even cuts it does an alright job. Try not to slice too thin or it'll rip the meat to shreds more than likely.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, lightweight and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a meat slicer for a while. the price was reasonable. The blade is very sharp and easy to clean. I like how lightweight it is and easy to work with. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Olimpia Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift for the chief in your life!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to cook and wanted this slicer for a number of reasons. One of which is the cost as well as salt in lunch meats. He now purchases ham and slices it as well as turkey breast. Cooks it and after its cooled he slices it as well for wonderful healthy sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Denise DePoto

customer_reviews.title: Good slicer for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a $65 meat slicer. It does what it's supposed to do. No bells and whistles. Cuts pretty consistent slices as long and you dont force it. Cut a log of hard salami with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good meat slicer
customer_reviews.text: Love this slicer! Don’t love to clean it up. I would definitely buy this product again. Only down side is that it takes longer to clean than setting it up and using it. Overall a good buy. You can control the thickness of your cuts from 5mm to 15mm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meat slicer
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy to use and helpful. Now I can order meats that I know are healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Louise Grazulis

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. A little noisy. It has a lot of crevices to clean. I used a bottle and nipple brush to clean out screw holes. Easy to use. My only real complaint is the suction cups. It would not suction to by counter. It keep sliding around. But other wise ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting meat
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have if you want to cut your product to your desired thickness
customer_reviews.author: DARIN RICHARDSON

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a xmas gift and my son loves it! Very strong motor and cuts very cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Good sharp blades. Clean up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: Wished there was different blades that can be purchased for it . Over all it's good for what I need it for !
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Replacement parts not available?
customer_reviews.text: Used to slice meat for beef jerky. Has dial to set on thickness desired, but will not stay on the selected thickness. Push guide is plastic (that holds the meat safely against the cutting blade) and broke the 4th time I used it and so far have not been able to find a replacement push guide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This arrived broken, the motor didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This arrived broken. The motor didn't work right, the blade was spinning really slowly and would not slice anything. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: impossible to cut prosciutto in thin slices
customer_reviews.text: Good for thick cuts, absolutely unsuitable for thin slices. Plasticky.
customer_reviews.author: CasualBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: This slicer is difficult to disassemble and a pain to clean. Otherwise pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: TOO SLOW TO SLICE
customer_reviews.text: This slicer is useless. It spins far too slow to use on meat, and it even slows down while slicing bread. The "adjustment" knob is incredibly inaccurate. Got this to make jerky, and it's honestly just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Returned not durable to cut brisket, hard to clean and no power
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. I sliced up my jam on Serrano m enjoyed. Looking forward to more slicing adventures. Any suggestions? Hostess of the mostess. Foodie at heart. Presentation is everything.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so nice!! Easy to use, easy to clean, cuts perfect slices. Love IT!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: NOT SAFE TO USE AT ALL Was not even able to cut ham in one piece (it got shredded) Do yourself a favor and stay away from this machine
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this product. It’s not easy to clean at all. Very difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Soleil

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims to do
customer_reviews.text: I got this slicer to make pit beef and pit turkey sandwiches. I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy prep and money saver
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's a great meat prep machine for the meals ahead and a money saver.
customer_reviews.author: Kaupu

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups don’t hold and the unit is hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the first couple of times I used it. Then it broke. Some of the parts inside are not strong enough to last.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Great but slow blade
customer_reviews.text: It works great but it’s slow so you just have to learn how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: David Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean and use. I've used it from cheese to tri tip and it has impressed me every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy wish I can return it.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. Not sturdy and not easy to clean at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Used it to slice some beef, easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Langas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Works great to cut roast into thin pieces to make my beef jerky
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the value
customer_reviews.text: This slicer works great for the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty useful stuff to slice meet in my kitchen, any size slice of meet which I’d like is easy to slice, good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Works like the larger ones
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller than my old one and lighter, which I love! Works great
customer_reviews.author: Donna Halford

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it, it has very little power and makes the meat slide forward because of not having a cover on the blade
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied customers

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Slicer
customer_reviews.text: I use this every other week to make my home made beef jerky. I slice the near frozen bottom round steak into thin slices with this great slicer. It is easy to clean minus the Screw Holes directly behind the blade that can get meat debris in them. I found a small plastic brush to reach in there and clean those areas though, so problem solved. Works on other types of vegetables and food.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels in MN

customer_reviews.title: Just works
customer_reviews.text: The machine does not slice meats thin with the settings as adjusted. Made a roast to slice as roast beef sandwich meat and the blade did not cut very well regardless of the grain of the meat. It barely does the job. Adequate, but nothing impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: Loud, Awkward To Clean & Struggled To Slice Ham
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubby and unfortunately he let it sit around too long before using it for the first time and it was outside of the return window. He was very unhappy with it. The slicer struggled through deli ham. It's very loud and awkward to clean. The clear plastic guide doesn't have enough grip and the meat slides on the platform when it gets to the couple of inches.
customer_reviews.author: iheartmick

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more for good slicer
customer_reviews.text: No good. Blade spins too slow. Meat moves all over slicer. Very dangerous. A lot of little crevices where food hides. Tried round cut meat for jerky and meat moves all over. Waste a lot of meat. Sliced deli. No room to slide, destroys meat. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: For the $$ it works fine. It does not go super thin like I hoped and it is not very powerful, but overall it works and what it cuts it does a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: SR1997

customer_reviews.title: hope you like thick meat!
customer_reviews.text: would not slice thin slices. You have to close the dial to the smallest setting & push real hard so you either end up powdering your lunch meat, slicing it uneven, or slicing it thick.
customer_reviews.author: AMY Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Another (good) gadget for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: Very good NON-commercial slicer. It's a little on the cheap side build-wise; it flexes and tears instead of slices if you force it. But I didn't spend $500 either. Use slow steady pressure and it will do great.
customer_reviews.author: djazz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed with this slicer. It could not cut an even slice of cheese, one corner was always thinner than the rest. I did not apply pressure against the blade, as per instructions, just guided the small brick of cheese along the pathway. I did return this, and will keep looking for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cindylou Who

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price.Biggest problem is only using for a few minutes and waiting for it to cool.
customer_reviews.author: B. E.

customer_reviews.title: It is a safe product to use.
customer_reviews.text: Like how easy it is to use but like all of these products, those nooks and crannies are time consuming to clean. But I like the machine
customer_reviews.author: Fran S

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Sliced meat, cheese, and bread very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: surprised, for the price , works better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use, small roasts
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected and has been easy to use for home use
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lang

product_meta.title: Elite Platinum Ultimate Precision Electric Deli Food Meat Slicer Removable Stainless Steel Blade, Adjustable Thickness, Ideal for Cold Cuts, Hard Cheese, Vegetables & Bread, 7.5”, Black
product_meta.description:
Want To Make A Cold Cut Platter That Looks Like It’s Straight Off The Pages Of A Gourmet Magazine?

Looking for a way to enjoy your favorite salamis, hard cheeses or meats without having to run out to the store every other day? Want to impress your friends during your next wine-tasting dinner party?

Introducing The Ultimate Precision Electric Meat Slicer By Elite Platinum!

Now you don’t have to waste your time, effort and money on sliced meat anymore, since you can easily enjoy all your delicious cold cuts, as thinly sliced as you want, from the comfort of your home! Our convenient and fuss-free food slicer will help you make the most finger-licking snacks, appetizers and sandwiches with zero effort!

Why Choose The Elite Platinum Meat Slicer?



 * Ultra-Sharp 7.5-Inch Stainless Steel Blade – our rustproof, retractable and removable cutting blade will help you slice any food with surgical precision.





 * Adjustable Thickness – go from razor-thin slices to ½-inch thick slices by simply adjusting the thickness and tailoring it to your exact needs.





 * Sturdy, Stable & Safe – our professional-grade ham slicer features a large slicing platform with nonslip rubber feet for maximum stability and safety.





 * Unparalleled Versatility – you can use your food slicer for turkey breast, pepperoni, ham, chorizo, beef pastrami, salamis, gouda, edam, cheddar, firm vegetables or even bread.





 * Easy To Clean – we have taken all the fuss out of cleaning your food slicer by making sure that the blade is removable!



Spoil Your Loved Ones!

The Elite Platinum meat slicer will make the perfect housewarming, birthday, anniversary, retirement or Christmas present!

Click “Add To Cart” NOW Before We Run Out Of Stock… Again!
feature_bullets: DAZZLE YOUR FRIENDS & FAMILY WITH THE MOST DELICIOUS FINELY-SLICED MEATS with the Elite Platinum premium electric meat slicer, which is specifically designed to help you save precious time, effort and money! How? Now you don’t have to go to the store and get sliced meat or cheese anymore! You can easily do it yourself at home with our user-friendly food slicer!

PRECISELY CUT SALAMI, HAM, MORTADELLA, CHORIZO OR PEPPERONI with our multipurpose and reliable meat slicer, which will allow you to enjoy your favorite cold cuts, hard cheeses, fruit, vegetables or even bread like never before! All you have to do is adjust the desired thickness for your food! You can easily choose from razor-thin to ½” slices and start slicing like a pro!

A MUST-HAVE KITCHEN ACCESSORY FOR EVERY MODERN HOUSEHOLD!  Have you ever thought how easier your life would be if you had a practical meat slicer at your disposal? Whether you are planning a wine-tasting night with your friends, a Christmas party with your family or just want to make yummy sandwiches for your kids every single day, our meat slicer is a must-have!

SPOIL YOUR LOVED ONES WITH THE MOM-APPROVED HOUSEWARMING GIFT IDEA! Surprise your wife, girlfriend, sister, mother, daughter, granddaughter or grandmother with our professional-grade electric meat precision slicer today! She will love the easy-to-clean design (thanks to the removable blade) while the sturdy, non-slip construction will make slicing meat a breeze!

FINALLY, HERE’S A MEAT SLICER THAT WILL PASS THE TEST OF TIME! Unlike all those cheaply-made food slicers, our meat slicer is made from premium-quality die-cast aluminum, which is not only super-durable, but also rustproof and easy to clean. As a result, you can rest assured that your robust meat slicer will endure any abuse without skipping a beat!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars369 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
